description: This file is a test suite for a React application, focusing on verifying the layout elements such as header and footer text across pages. It imports testing utilities, the main App component, and custom test utilities to set up the test environment.

methods.name: beforeEach
methods.description: Sets up the environment before each test, specifically resetting storage.

methods.name: test
methods.description: Defines a test case that checks if header, brand, and footer texts are present across pages.
